sentences: See on sajandi alguses tehtud otsus.
Sajandi vältel on tekkinud palju muutusi.
context: The word 'sajandi' is the genitive singular form of the Estonian noun 'sajand', which means 'century' or 'hundred years'. It indicates possession, relation to, or movement from a century. In the context provided, it appears in the phrase 'möödunud sajandi algul' meaning 'at the beginning of the past century'. The genitive case is commonly used in Estonian to indicate time periods when something happens or belongs to.
